reviewText: In the Italian comedy Natale a Miami, middle-aged Giorgio (Christian De Sica) fights off the repeated sexual advances of Stella (Vanessa Hessler), his best friend's stunningly beautiful teenage daughter, until her father inadvertently gives Giorgio the green light to have sex [for ten seconds] with the stunning nymphet. What's interesting is that Stella informed her middle-aged love interest that her love for him began when she was thirteen. The Allure of Nymphets
